name: UTXO Swap
description: UTXO Swap is an innovative decentralized exchange deployed on Nervos CKB’s Layer 2 infrastructure, harnessing the blockchain’s Extended UTXO model and robust Proof-of-Work security to enable highly efficient, intent-driven trading of Bitcoin-native assets, such as Runes and inscriptions, while offering seamless cross-chain bridging capabilities to facilitate secure, trust-minimized asset transfers between Bitcoin and CKB ecosystems, thereby enhancing scalability, interoperability, and user accessibility for decentralized finance applications.

highlights.title: Intent-Driven Trading
highlights.description: Utilizes an intent-based model to streamline asset swaps, improving efficiency and user experience for Bitcoin ecosystem traders

highlights.title: Integration with Bitcoin Wallets
highlights.description: Compatible with popular Bitcoin wallets like Unisat, enabling easy access for Bitcoin ecosystem users

highlights.title: Community-Driven Development
highlights.description: Actively incorporates community feedback to refine features and expand functionality for broader DeFi adoption

related.title: CKB Punks
related.desc: The first NFT collection on Nervos.

faq.a: Nervape is a multi-chain composable digital object (DOB) platform in the Nervos CKB ecosystem.

faq.q: How to get a Nervape DOB?
faq.a: You can mint or trade DOBs on the Nervape platform.
